official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional personal exemption for single taxpayers maintaining a household with dependent children.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an additional exemption for single taxpayers maintaining a household with dependent children.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional personal exemption for single taxpayers maintaining a household with dependent children.
